thread.title: BRIEF-First Data Says For Q1, Co Will Record Cumulative Adjustment To Retained Earnings Of About $15 Mln

title: BRIEF-First Data Says For Q1, Co Will Record Cumulative Adjustment To Retained Earnings Of About $15 Mln
text:
April 16, 2018 / 8:37 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-First Data Says For Q1, Co Will Record Cumulative Adjustment To Retained Earnings Of About $15 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 16 (Reuters) - First Data Corp: 
* FIRST DATA CORP - FOR Q1, CO WILL RECORD A CUMULATIVE ADJUSTMENT TO RETAINED EARNINGS OF ABOUT $15 MILLION TO APPLY NEW REVENUE STANDARD 
* FIRST DATA CORP - ADOPTION OF NEW RETIREMENT STANDARD DID NOT IMPACT COMPANY'S NET INCOME, CONSOLIDATED REVENUE, OR SEGMENT REVENUE Source text ( bit.ly/2qCMGF9 ) Further company coverage:
